trans-unit.source: Using the Payments and Reconciliations (DK) Extension | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Using the Payments and Reconciliations (DK) Extension | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Používání rozšíření Payments and Reconciliations (DK) | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: This extension makes it easy to export files that are pre-formatted to meet bank requirements for electronic submissions.

seg-source.mrk: This extension makes it easy to export files that are pre-formatted to meet bank requirements for electronic submissions.

target.mrk: Toto rozšíření usnadňuje export souborů, které jsou předem naformátovány tak, aby splňovaly bankovní požadavky na elektronická podání.

trans-unit.source: The Payments and Reconciliations (DK) Extension

seg-source.mrk: The Payments and Reconciliations (DK) Extension

trans-unit.source: Make fast, error-free payments by exporting files that are formatted specifically for exchanges with your vendor or bank.

seg-source.mrk: Make fast, error-free payments by exporting files that are formatted specifically for exchanges with your vendor or bank.

target.mrk: Proveďte rychlé a bezchybné platby exportováním souborů, které jsou speciálně formátovány pro výměny s dodavatelem nebo bankou.

trans-unit.source: These files speed up the payment and reconciliation processes, and eliminate errors that can happen when you manually enter the information on a bank website.

seg-source.mrk: These files speed up the payment and reconciliation processes, and eliminate errors that can happen when you manually enter the information on a bank website.

target.mrk: Tyto soubory urychlují procesy platby a odsouhlasení a eliminují chyby, ke kterým může dojít, když ručně zadáváte informace na webové stránce banky.

trans-unit.source: This extension supports file formats for several Danish banks.

seg-source.mrk: This extension supports file formats for several Danish banks.

target.mrk: Toto rozšíření podporuje formáty souborů pro několik dánských bank.

trans-unit.source: When you export payment information to a file, the extension packages the data into the format that your bank requires.

seg-source.mrk: When you export payment information to a file, the extension packages the data into the format that your bank requires.

target.mrk: Při exportu platebních údajů do souboru toto rozšíření doplní data do formátu, který vaše banka vyžaduje.

trans-unit.source: For example, the formats include Bankdata-V3, BEC, SDC, and FIK, which many different banks use, and some that are more specialized for certain banks, for example, Danske Bank and Nordea.

seg-source.mrk: For example, the formats include Bankdata-V3, BEC, SDC, and FIK, which many different banks use, and some that are more specialized for certain banks, for example, Danske Bank and Nordea.

target.mrk: Formáty například zahrnují Bankdata-V3, BEC, SDC and FIK, které používá mnoho různých bank, a některé, které jsou více specializovány pro určité banky, například Danske Bank a Nordea.

trans-unit.source: The extension also includes some formats for importing and reconciling bank statements.

seg-source.mrk: The extension also includes some formats for importing and reconciling bank statements.

target.mrk: Toto rozšíření také zahrnuje některé formáty pro import a odsouhlasení bankovních výpisů.

trans-unit.source: To use the extension, you must know the format that your bank or vendor requires.

seg-source.mrk: To use the extension, you must know the format that your bank or vendor requires.

target.mrk: Chcete-li toto rozšíření používat, musíte znát formát, který vaše banka nebo prodejce vyžaduje.

trans-unit.source: Some banks or vendors provide this information on their websites; however, you might need to contact their customer service to get the information.

seg-source.mrk: Some banks or vendors provide this information on their websites; however, you might need to contact their customer service to get the information.

target.mrk: Některé banky nebo prodejci poskytují tyto informace na svých webových stránkách, ale možná budete muset kontaktovat jejich zákaznický servis, abyste tyto informace získali.

trans-unit.source: Supported Bank Formats

seg-source.mrk: Supported Bank Formats

trans-unit.source: This extension can apply the following file formats for payment files:

seg-source.mrk: This extension can apply the following file formats for payment files:

target.mrk: Toto rozšíření může pro platební soubory použít následující formáty souborů:

trans-unit.source: BANKDATA-V3

seg-source.mrk: BANKDATA-V3

trans-unit.source: BEC-INDLAND

seg-source.mrk: BEC-INDLAND

trans-unit.source: BEC-CSV

seg-source.mrk: BEC-CSV

trans-unit.source: DANSKEBANK-CMKV

seg-source.mrk: DANSKEBANK-CMKV

trans-unit.source: DANSKEBANK-CMKXKSX

seg-source.mrk: DANSKEBANK-CMKXKSX

trans-unit.source: DANSKEBANK

seg-source.mrk: DANSKEBANK

trans-unit.source: FIK71

seg-source.mrk: FIK71

trans-unit.source: NORDEA-ERHVERV-CSV

seg-source.mrk: NORDEA-ERHVERV-CSV

trans-unit.source: NORDEA

seg-source.mrk: NORDEA

trans-unit.source: NORDEA-UNITEL-V3

seg-source.mrk: NORDEA-UNITEL-V3

trans-unit.source: SDC

seg-source.mrk: SDC

trans-unit.source: SDC-CSV

seg-source.mrk: SDC-CSV

trans-unit.source: To set up the extension

seg-source.mrk: To set up the extension

trans-unit.source: There are a few steps to get started.

seg-source.mrk: There are a few steps to get started.

trans-unit.source: Allow payment data exports.

seg-source.mrk: Allow payment data exports.

trans-unit.source: To help protect your data, this is not readily available.

seg-source.mrk: To help protect your data, this is not readily available.

target.mrk: Toto není snadno dostupné z důvodu ochrany vašich dat.

trans-unit.source: Set up purchase and payables so that you do not require external document numbers on invoices.

seg-source.mrk: Set up purchase and payables so that you do not require external document numbers on invoices.

target.mrk: Nastavte nákup a závazky tak, abyste na fakturách nevyžadovali externí čísla dokumentů.

trans-unit.source: If needed, you can use the reference number to refer to a specific invoice.

seg-source.mrk: If needed, you can use the reference number to refer to a specific invoice.

target.mrk: V případě potřeby můžete použít referenční číslo pro odkaz na konkrétní fakturu.

trans-unit.source: Specify the payment method for each vendor.

seg-source.mrk: Specify the payment method for each vendor.

target.mrk: Zadejte způsob platby pro každého dodavatele.

trans-unit.source: Payment methods define how you pay invoices from the vendor.

seg-source.mrk: Payment methods define how you pay invoices from the vendor.

target.mrk: Způsoby plateb definují způsob, jakým platíte faktury od dodavatele.

trans-unit.source: For example, Bank, Cash, Check, or Account.

seg-source.mrk: For example, Bank, Cash, Check, or Account.

target.mrk: Například banka, hotovost, šek nebo účet.

trans-unit.source: Specify the type of format to use for each of your bank accounts.

seg-source.mrk: Specify the type of format to use for each of your bank accounts.

target.mrk: Určete typ formátu, který se použije pro každý z vašich bankovních účtů.

trans-unit.source: For example, NORDEA, DANSKEBANK, SDC, and so on.

seg-source.mrk: For example, NORDEA, DANSKEBANK, SDC, and so on.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you must assign vendors to a domestic **Gen. Bus. Posting Group** and a **Vendor Posting Group**.

seg-source.mrk: Additionally, you must assign vendors to a domestic **Gen.
Bus. Posting Group** and a **Vendor Posting Group**.

target.mrk: Kromě toho musíte přiřadit dodavatele k domácí **Obecné
obch.účto** skupině a k **Účto skupině dodatavatele**.

trans-unit.source: The Country/Region setting for the vendor must be Denmark (DK).

seg-source.mrk: The Country/Region setting for the vendor must be Denmark (DK).

target.mrk: Nastavení země/oblasti pro dodavatele musí být Dánsko (DK).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Setting Up Posting Groups](finance-posting-groups.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Setting Up Posting Groups](finance-posting-groups.md).

target.mrk: Pro další informace navštivte [Nastavení skupin účtování](finance-posting-groups.md).

trans-unit.source: To allow [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] to export payment data

seg-source.mrk: To allow [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] to export payment data

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Payment Journal**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Payment Journal**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovka, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zvolte **Deník plateb** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: On the **Edit Payment Journal** page, choose the **Bank** batch.

seg-source.mrk: On the **Edit Payment Journal** page, choose the **Bank** batch.

target.mrk: Na stránce **Upravit deník plateb** zvolte dávku **Banka**.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **Allow Payment Export** check box.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **Allow Payment Export** check box.

trans-unit.source: To specify a payment method for a vendor

seg-source.mrk: To specify a payment method for a vendor

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the combinations of FIK and GIRO payment methods that [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] supports.

seg-source.mrk: The following table shows the combinations of FIK and GIRO payment methods that [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] supports.

target.mrk: Následující tabulka ukazuje kombinace platebních metod FIK a ŽIRO, které [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] podporuje.

trans-unit.source: Type 01

seg-source.mrk: Type 01

trans-unit.source: Type 04

seg-source.mrk: Type 04

trans-unit.source: Type 71

seg-source.mrk: Type 71

trans-unit.source: Type 73

seg-source.mrk: Type 73

trans-unit.source: Giro Account No. or FIK Creditor No.?

seg-source.mrk: Giro Account No. or FIK Creditor No.?

target.mrk: Číslo žirového účtu nebo číslo FIK kreditora?

trans-unit.source: Giro Account No.

seg-source.mrk: Giro Account No.

trans-unit.source: Giro Account No.

seg-source.mrk: Giro Account No.

trans-unit.source: FIK Creditor No.

seg-source.mrk: FIK Creditor No.

trans-unit.source: FIK Creditor No.

seg-source.mrk: FIK Creditor No.

trans-unit.source: Allows Message to Recipient?

seg-source.mrk: Allows Message to Recipient?

trans-unit.source: Yes

seg-source.mrk: Yes

trans-unit.source: No

seg-source.mrk: No

trans-unit.source: No

seg-source.mrk: No

trans-unit.source: Yes

seg-source.mrk: Yes

trans-unit.source: Contains Payment Reference number?

seg-source.mrk: Contains Payment Reference number?

trans-unit.source: No

seg-source.mrk: No

trans-unit.source: Yes, 16 digits.

seg-source.mrk: Yes, 16 digits.

trans-unit.source: Yes, 15 digits.

seg-source.mrk: Yes, 15 digits.

trans-unit.source: No

seg-source.mrk: No

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Vendors**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Vendors**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovka, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zvolte **Dodavatelé** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Open the card, expand the **Payments** tab, in the **Payment Method** field choose the payment method.

seg-source.mrk: Open the card, expand the **Payments** tab, in the **Payment Method** field choose the payment method.

target.mrk: Otevřete kartu, rozbalte záložku **Platby** a v poli **Způsob platby** zvolte způsob platby.

trans-unit.source: Depending on your selection, you must complete other fields.

seg-source.mrk: Depending on your selection, you must complete other fields.

target.mrk: V závislosti na vašem výběru musíte vyplnit další pole.

trans-unit.source: See the table above for a description of the combinations.

seg-source.mrk: See the table above for a description of the combinations.

trans-unit.source: To specify the format to use for a bank account

seg-source.mrk: To specify the format to use for a bank account

target.mrk: Pro určení formátu, který se použije pro bankovní účet

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Bank Accounts**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Bank Accounts**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovka, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zadejte **Bankovní účty** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Open the card for the bank account.

seg-source.mrk: Open the card for the bank account.

trans-unit.source: In the **Payment Export Format** field, choose the format for your export file.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Payment Export Format** field, choose the format for your export file.

target.mrk: V poli **Formát exportu plateb**, zvolte formát vašeho exportovaného souboru.

trans-unit.source: Choosing the FIK or Giro payment information for vendor invoices

seg-source.mrk: Choosing the FIK or Giro payment information for vendor invoices

target.mrk: Výběr platebních informací FIK nebo ŽIRO pro faktury dodavatele

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Purchase Invoices**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Purchase Invoices**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovka, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zadejte **Nákupní faktury** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Choose the vendor.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the vendor.

trans-unit.source: Remember, this must be a Danish vendor with an address in Denmark.

seg-source.mrk: Remember, this must be a Danish vendor with an address in Denmark.

target.mrk: Pamatujte, že se musí jednat o dánského prodejce s adresou v Dánsku.

trans-unit.source: Create an invoice.

seg-source.mrk: Create an invoice.

trans-unit.source: The **Payment Method** and **Vendor Number** fields are filled in based on settings on the Vendor card.

seg-source.mrk: The **Payment Method** and **Vendor Number** fields are filled in based on settings on the Vendor card.

target.mrk: Pole **Způsob platby** a **Číslo dodavatele** jsou vyplněna na základě nastavení v kartě dodavatele.

trans-unit.source: You can change them if you want.

seg-source.mrk: You can change them if you want.

trans-unit.source: In the **Payment Reference** field, enter the 15-digit number from the vendor invoice.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Payment Reference** field, enter the 15-digit number from the vendor invoice.

target.mrk: Do pole **Platební reference** zadejte 15místné číslo z faktury dodavatele.

trans-unit.source: You only have to add the last 11 digits of the number.

seg-source.mrk: You only have to add the last 11 digits of the number.

target.mrk: Musíte přidat pouze posledních 11 číslic tohoto čísla.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] will add four zeros to the beginning of the number.

seg-source.mrk: will add four zeros to the beginning of the number.

target.mrk: přidá čtyři nuly na začátek čísla.

trans-unit.source: Post the invoice.

seg-source.mrk: Post the invoice.

trans-unit.source: To use the extension to export payment data

seg-source.mrk: To use the extension to export payment data

target.mrk: Použití tohoto rozšíření pro export dat platby

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Payment Journals**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Payment Journals**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovka, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zvolte **Deník plateb** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **Suggest Vendor Payment Journals** action.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **Suggest Vendor Payment Journals** action.

trans-unit.source: If you want to export only specific payments, use the options for filtering the data.

seg-source.mrk: If you want to export only specific payments, use the options for filtering the data.

target.mrk: Pokud chcete exportovat pouze konkrétní platby, použijte možnosti filtrování dat.

trans-unit.source: If needed, you can add filters to export only specific payments.

seg-source.mrk: If needed, you can add filters to export only specific payments.

target.mrk: V případě potřeby můžete přidat filtry a exportovat pouze konkrétní platby.

trans-unit.source: In the **Bank Payment Type** field, choose **Electronic Payment**.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Bank Payment Type** field, choose **Electronic Payment**.

target.mrk: V poli **Typ platby v bance** Zvolte **Elektronická platba**.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **Export** action.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **Export** action.
